amendment.description: Amendment prohibits violent juvenile offenders from ever possessing a gun.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 11 and printed in part B of H. Rept. to prohibit persons who commit an act of violent juvenile delinquency from possessing firearms as adults.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogan amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 395 - 27 (Roll no. 242).
